question:
Which of the following statements is/are correct regarding the pillars of the Ramsar Convention?
1) Work towards the wise use of all their wetlands through national land-use planning
2) Designate suitable wetlands for the List of Wetlands of International Importance
3) Cooperate internationally concerning transboundary wetlands
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation:
The three pillars of the Ramsar Convention are:
1) Work towards the wise use of all their wetlands through national land-use planning
2) Designate suitable wetlands for the List of Wetlands of International Importance
3) Cooperate internationally concerning transboundary wetlands
